name: Geonauts
description:
Geonauts is a precision adventure game that tests your reaction time and reflexes. It focuses on simple but challenging gameplay. Fly between obstacles in your Geopod, a subterranean spaceship designed to navigate Mar's vast underground caverns.

Use your rocket boosters to avoid sharp rocks, falling boulders, and the unforgiving Martian landscape.

Play as Captain Mara Sanchez, an elite Geonaut pilot, as she searches for a missing probe in the caverns below the formidable Olympus Mons. Uncover the mystery of what lies at the heart of our solar system's most notorious supervolcano.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

  • Down Arrow: Primary Thruster
  • Left Arrow: Left Thruster
  • Right Arrow: Right Thruster
  • Space Bar: Primary Thruster
  • A Key: Left Thruster
  • D Key: Right Thruster

DIALOGUE CONTROLS

  • Space Bar: Progress Dialogue

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
